name: MirageMix
description: 我融合的模型中觉得还行的一个

modelVersions.name: v2.0-fp16
modelVersions.description: 由于1.0版本在部分情况下，对“2girls”这个tag没有较好的反馈，有一定概率在图画中只生成一个人，所以特地更新了2.0版本，能正确的生成“2girls”，当然并不是说1.0版本无法生成2个及2个以上的人物，通过增加权重可以保证能生成多人。权重具体选择多少视情况而定，毕竟有的时候不加权也能生成两个人。1.0和2.0看个人喜好自行选择。但是2.0版本似乎在多人上仍然存在一些问题，一但涉及的tag过多，仍然会和1.0一样,这个问题在许多模型中都有所体现，似乎是一个通病Due to the inadequacy of the 1.0 version in some cases where the "2girls" tag was not well responded to, there was a certain probability of only generating one person in the picture. Therefore, a special update to version 2.0 was made to correctly generate "2girls". Of course, this does not mean that the 1.0 version cannot generate two or more characters. By increasing the weight, it is possible to ensure the generation of multiple people. The specific weight selection depends on the situation, as sometimes two people can be generated without weight adjustment. The choice between 1.0 and 2.0 depends on personal preference.However, it seems that the 2.0 version still has some issues with multiple people. Once there are too many related tags, it will still encounter the same problem as 1.0. This problem is reflected in many models and seems to be a common issue.
